original_title: Soaring Highs and Brutal Lows: The Voices of Women in Metal
overview: Celebrates the stories of eight female vocalists in the heavy metal genre. Through personal interviews, behind the scenes insights, and concert footage, these women describe in their own words, their choices, their lives, and the hardships and triumphs of being center stage in what is widely perceived as a male-dominated music scene.
tagline: Their Music. Their Dreams. Their Challenges. Their Triumphs. Their Voices.
title: Soaring Highs and Brutal Lows: The Voices of Women in Metal
